IndiGo carried 124 million passengers last year, operating over 2,200 flights daily.

title: The silent hormone crisis at work: Why more working women are battling thyroid disorders

Early detection and management are crucial for working women to maintain their health and careers.

description: New CCTV footage reveals the aircraft carrying Maharashtra's Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar tilted sharply before crashing near Baramati, suggesting a loss of stability. Eyewitnesses reported the jet struggling to land, circling once before an aggressive bank and descent.

A chilling deja Vu: When Ajit Pawar spoke of mid-air scare in Gadchiroli
description: Recalling a harrowing mid-air experience during a flight to Gadchiroli in July 2024, Ajit Pawar described chanting Lord Pandurang's name amidst near-zero visibility due to heavy rain and fog. He recounted how then deputy chief minister Devendra Fadnavis remained calm, reassuring him of his safety, an anecdote now tinged with sadness following Pawar's tragic death.

Time stops at 8.44am in Baramati, Pawars’ hometown unites in time of grief to salute Dada
description: Baramati mourns the tragic loss of its beloved leader, Ajit Pawar, who died in a plane crash. The town, known for its unwavering support for the Pawar family, came to a standstill as residents expressed profound grief. Ajit Pawar's dedication to his constituency and his people was evident in the outpouring of sorrow and tributes.

She is survived by a young son.

Agnihotri, who cleared PCS in 2019, believes the regulations will harm general-category students and divide society.

Following stringent measures in Budget 2025, including a 30% flat tax and 1% TDS, experts urge for nuanced rules on loss set-offs and asset classification. While some anticipate reforms, others foresee continued aggressive taxation, emphasizing compliance.

title: Japan's second richest man 'drops' plan to spend $50 billion on buying American company
description: Japan's second-richest man, Masayoshi Son, has reportedly halted $50 billion acquisition talks for US data center firm Switch Inc. This move impacts SoftBank's ambitious Stargate AI infrastructure plans, which aimed to power OpenAI. While a full takeover is off, discussions for a partial investment or partnership continue, as SoftBank doubles down on AI investments.
